body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(ciomnn, com), cpinfty))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(ciomnn, cun(cmpt(hs0, com, cop(cec(cop(crab(hs1, cnq, wbr(cv(hs1), cltq, cop(csuc(cv(hs0)), c1o))), c1p), cer), c0r)), csn(cop(com, cpinfty)))))
-| wi(wtru, wn(wcel(com, com)))
-| wi(wtru, wcel(com, universe))
-| wi(wtru, wcel(cpinfty, cccbar))

body.pretty:
⊢ (T →(iomnn ` _om)= pinfty)
⊣ (T → iomnn =((hs0 ∈ _om ↦ <[< { hs1 ∈ ℚ+ | hs1[<]< suc(hs0), 1o > }, 1 >]~, 0 >)⋃ { < _om, pinfty > }))
⊣ (T → ¬ _om ∈ _om)
⊣ (T → _om ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (T → pinfty ∈ CCbar)
⊣ d(hs0, _om)
